extendedInfo.description: â AppGratis promotion is over, thank you everyone for your support! âGallery 3D Live Wallpaper is finally here!  Take advantage of the various gorgeous themes provided to you, and turn your photo and image collections into stunning 3D live wallpapers.Gallery 3D comes with one base theme and particle effect for Free.   There are three other Premium Themes and particle effects package that can be previewed, and are available through in-app purchases.Personalization is the key concept behind this beautifully designed live wallpaper.  Gallery 3D comes with a wide array of option & features to help you customize your photo or image collection into a amazing live wallpaper thatâs truly your own.  With four great themes, large selection of beautiful background image, many customization options, four particle effects to choose from & the ability to display your own image/photo collection, Gallery 3D is one of the most advanced & customizable personal live wallpaper available.Gallery 3D Live Wallpaper have many features, including:Up to four great looking gallery themes to choose fromWide array of options to customize your live wallpaperLarge selection of background imagesParticle effects that you can add to further enhance your themeEasy to use browsing tool to find and select the photos you want to useInteractive themes that bring your photo collections to liveGreat looking & intuitive interface all aroundDownload Gallery 3D today and check out these beautiful image gallery themes.

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: Wish I could pick which of the default pictures I want. I highly recommend this app.
reviews.author: Chris Wood

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I always enjoy seeing the slide show of my favorite pictures on my deskstop, and really adore how they are shown.  Is there any way that I can add pictures instead of picking all my favs all over again?
reviews.author: Elaine Gifford

reviews.comment: Able to open the app now, it\'s all my fault by disabling \"Live Wallpaper Picker\". Great dev by responding immediately and want to fix it ASAP :)

reviews.title: Nice  but
reviews.comment: Would be nice if I could choose which background pics of the already loaded ones. As for now imma stick with hd backgrounds app. But I will check back everytime an update appears , cause it does have potential.
reviews.author: Matt Miller

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Really good app but not a lot you can do unless I cant figure it out but goes to show could do with some tutorial. Thanks for the help I figured it out eventually :-)
reviews.author: Matthew Dial

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Got the paid version for free today with appgratis. This app has got really nice visuals and effects and although I personally prefer much more minimalistic wallpapers, I can certainly Suggest to those looking for colourful and vibrant live wallpapers to give this one a look!
reviews.author: Constantine White

reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.comment: Got this free from AppGratis.  Not sure how someone could  miss the \"browse\" button which enables you to select any photo to use as your background.  The stock photos are nice but just enough to get you going.  This means less space taken up by unwanted pictures.  This app seems like it has great potential.  Get it free today and definitely get AppGratis.
reviews.author: Anne Burns

reviews.title: was rubbish untill
reviews.comment: i fiddled around whith it and set a random wallpaper it let me on the settings and i is awesome thanks app gratis thanks genbu studios

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: This is an awesome app,  exactly what I was looking for as a home screen replacement and now all the effects are even unlocked thanks to app gratis.  Please keep up the great work guys!
reviews.author: Benjamin Enos
